version_description:
天团小伙伴，CTO来了一个礼拜放了个大招，他很得瑟：

1. 所有风格清晰度提高了一倍，速度竟然还比以前快了，不科学
2. 所有风格通过我们设计师的调色更美了
3. 个人页面中添加了分享邀请码，你也可以邀请你的小伙伴来用Versa了


感谢
Tianyi @ Versa
击败了若干个bug君

各位小伙伴，我们又见面了！

1. 增加了风格分类！不再为改用什么风格而烦恼
2. 增加了编辑功能，推出尺寸和留白功能，让你的画更带感
3. 给大家介绍咱们的新CEO（Chief Entertainment Officer）：Bobo，他可霸气了~

感谢

在大家的反馈声中，我们为大家送上了 风格色 原色切换 功能
在 调整 中的第一个选项，试着点击《风格色》，让你的作品有不一样的风情~

各位小伙伴，Versa Space来了

几个月来，我们希望用AI为你的创作多一点可能性。30万个邀请码几周就全部发完。
现在，我们想看见你的作品，看见你的快乐，看见你的悲伤，看见你的才华。看见你。

谢谢各位的支持，真心感谢

亲爱的小伙伴，大家有没有被上个版本的《人景分离》惊艳到！
还没完，新版本又来了！

1. 新增《随机风格》功能，不知道选什么风格，AI为你决定
2. 新增《特效》，《人景分离》《风格色》都在里面
3. Space增加通知功能，收到其他小伙伴的评论和点赞

太感谢大家的支持了
Versa手机团队

Greetings, awesome creative artists!
Here comes our first international version update in 2017!
Try out the magical AI technology that could shape a new artistic world.
We salute you with these interesting updates in v2.4.
• Now you can use FLASH rendering effect, it can let you enjoy painting an image artwork in seconds (this effect is available on iphone6s or ios 11 device above).
• When you admire a marvellous image artwork at Versa Space, you only need to tap the image, then a TRY button will appear below. Just continue with it you can find the same effect & style applying to your own image immediately. So convenient to make an artwork!
• Sharing to Instagram, Facebook and Twitter now directly starts the application.

Start with Versa NOW! Get an oil painting selfie!
If you like what we are doing, please rate and review us:）

We have made some shining improvements:
*Figure segmentation updated into ever-changing Variety – no need for portrait camera, you can get a background blurring image by only one tap!

*Fixed some nasty problem within our device. From now on you will be given regular surprise by our best technology team!

To be honest, you may not feel much more changes in this update than our fussy boss can do, but you will like it!

Always it’s a pleasure to read a positive review from you!

Latest updates:

1. Figure Segmentation updated into-‘IconicWall’

-In such a social media heaven you can make your favorite person as a cool sticker!

2.The real information: we keep in killing bugs and improving user experience.

3. Leave your reviews, yo~~ :)

[Unique Blending]
Have you experienced the following issues while using Makaron?
After separating and changing background you find the image background and subject colors donot match?
The image separatoin tool is missing details?
Light and shade of different people or image subjects do not match the background?
The good news is these problems are already fixable!
Upload the images, use the "Blend" tool to instantly match your image's subject and background.
You can also finetune, adjust image separation outlines, edit tone and exposure as you like to create the perfect image.
Recreate your fantasy into a reality.

To be continued
Makaron Team

Hello
Bonjour
こんにちは
你好
In just few months, Makaron has discovered morn and more funny places. Nowadays, fans from more than 30 countries are inspired by this magical App.
This time, Makaron can speak English and Japanese. We do sincerely invite you and friends from all over the world to join us for the magical experience.
What’s more:
l We do lots of things to generate better user experience of group photo recognition.
l We have updated more pop ‘Preset’ effects and background this time.
Welcome to join the ‘Daily Topic’ and ‘Challenge campaign’ in ‘Discovery’!

To be Continued
Makaron Team

This time, we bring Makaron Spring Festival special version. In this spring, Makaron will put on the new clothes, paying New Year's call to everyone in Chinese Style.

Just find your favorite effect combination in ‘Preset’ to decorate your photo with your family, you can create your best wishes to all your relatives and friends.

During the Spring festival, we will preset lots of background in Chinese Style, provide funny and popular online campaign. Hope you can join and let us artistic mind burst!

Happy new year to all your family and all the best !

——This is the version update of Makaron V3.2——

Hi!
This is the second major version update of Makaron: Makaron – Motion Images
By using the three upgraded magical features, a simple static picture can be moving.
Just seek out the "GIF" icon, you will be surprised!

Moving Background
Background change is one of the most popular features of Makaron. This time, you will get a mass of preset moving background even video background.
A completely different wonderful experience! Want a go? #GIF

Moving Stickers
We provide lots of funny stickers in ‘+’ button! Try it to let your artistic mind burst! #GIF
BTW: All the figures, cats or puppy can be saved as a sticker material with one click for future applications.

Preset
Would you like to get all the dynamic cool effects mentioned above?
Just find ‘Preset’ button, we have preset more than 10 sets of cool effects.
You will love it.

To be Continued
Makaron Team

We bring lots of new pop effects in ‘Preset’ and some amusing challenge campaigns in ‘Discovery’. Welcome to join us!

-----Below is the major update of Makaron V3.2 version-----

Moving Background
Background change is one of the most popular features of Makaron. This time, you will get a mass of preset moving background even video background.
A completely different wonderful experience! Want a go? #GIF

Moving Sandwich Filter
It’s boring to add a simple layer of mask to an image.
In Makaron, you can add a layer of moving mask between figures and background.
That sounds interesting! #GIF

Moving Stickers
We provide lots of static stickers and moving stickers in ‘+’ button! Try it to let your artistic mind burst! #GIF
BTW: All the figures, cats or puppy can be saved as a sticker material with one click for future applications.

Preset
Would you like to get all the dynamic cool effects mentioned above?
Just find ‘Preset’ button, we have preseted more than 10 sets of cool effects.
You will love it.

To be Continued
Makaron Team

1. Give you a brand new visual experience in the personal main page.
2.Versa Space is going to support video playing. More exclusive functions will show up in Spring Festival!
3. Minimizing image errors & fixing bugs is always our mission.
4. Never stop your artistic way in having new styles
5. Leave us good reviews and happy Chinese New Year!

Notice of valuable updates
1. New feature: Image Background Changer-You can replace the background to whatever you like.
2. New event: Image challenges are waiting for you.
3. We have fixed a couple of bugs.
4. Leave your positive reviews, hooray!

IMPORTANT! New updates are coming!
1. Singing photos: Let your photo character come alive, get ready to say hi to your amazing expression?
2. Amazing Eraser and Signature are added to help you make a unique art piece.
3. First page improved: Pull up or pull down for latest posts!
4. Good reviews for us and good mood for you:)

Notice of valuable updates
1. New feature: Image Background Changer-You can replace the background to whatever you like.
2. New event: Image challenges are waiting for you.
3. We have fixed a couple of bugs.
4. Leave your positive reviews, hooray!
Fix several bugs and improve using experience.
The precision of ‘Figure Segmentation’ and ‘Image Background Changer’ has been increased to a great extent. You could not help cheering for that!

Back in December 13, 2017, a dream was born — the first Macaron design. At that time, we called it the Versa Dream Edition. Even as we design it, we think of it as a dream that is hard to reach. But we believed.
 
We shared this dream to a lot of people, but no one dared to believe. They doubt if AI can do such complex thing, they doubt the simplicity of the product, and they doubt that a team that small can actually do it. People believe that it is bound to fail, and that it is just a mere dream.
 
However, eight months have passed and we are still dreaming and creating. And the fruit of our efforts? The Versa Dreamliner to the Versa X to the Versa 3.0, and now, The Macaron Playpicture!
 
Day and night, we designed, created, and revised. A never-ending cycle that witnessed people in the verge of giving up. But we are getting closer and clearer to our imagination, to our dreams.
 
For eight months, each one us of persisted. We believe that our dream is getting there. A simple product for every ordinary creator. Macaron is our dream. We gave birth to it through the imagination and determination of every team member.
 
To our dear users, join us in this group of dreamers. we hope you find the courage to chase your dream, and we hope Macaron can be part of it.

Hi! This is the first major version update of Makaron: Makaron Healing. We enable you remove anyone you don't like in the image.

I want to introduce you to our two new features: x and +.

x
This magical feature solves the problem of unintentionally capturing passers-by in your photos. All you have to do is select the figure and click the 'x' button found in the upper left corner, then it will be deleted and the background will be added like magic. At the same time, you can freely zoom in and out to change the size of the figures.

With this button, any element in a picture is not permanent. We believe this is the easiest way to edit photos!

+
Along with the x, you can also find a + button. With this feature, you can grab figures such as a cat or a puppy from any picture to complete your creative stitching. Try it and let your artistic mind burst!

Of course, the app also offers many more features, such as clearer background classifications, downloadable filters, impressive modifications, and interesting challenges.

Hope you will like it.
To be continued.
Makaron Team

Hi！
We are so happy to share a great news to everybody, Versa - Pastiche Master got a brand new name: Makaron.
Versa grows with endless fantastic ideas, more and more functions are created like magic. It is not a Versa - Pastiche Master anymore, but a Makaron！
Makaron has an unique function , Makaron Healing. It enables you to remove anyone that you don't want to present in the image.
Let's try with clicking x and +
x
This magical feature solves the problem of unintentionally capturing passers-by in your photos. All you have to do is select the figure and click the 'x' button found in the upper left corner, then it will be deleted and the background will be added like magic. At the same time, you can freely zoom in and out to change the size of the figures.
With this button, any element in a picture is not permanent. We believe this is the easiest way to edit photos!
+
Along with the x, you can also find a + button. With this feature, you can grab figures such as a cat or a puppy from any picture to complete your creative stitching. Try it and let your artistic mind burst!
Of course, the app also offers many more features, such as clearer background classifications, downloadable filters, impressive modifications, and interesting challenges.

Hope you will like it.
To be continued.
Makaron Team

Hi!
This is the second major version update of Makaron: Makaron – Moving Images.
By using the four upgraded magical features, a simple static picture can be moving.
Just seek out the "GIF" icon, you will be surprised!

Moving Background
Background change is one of the most popular features of Makaron. This time, you will get a mass of preset moving background even video background.
A completely different wonderful experience! Want a go? #GIF

Moving Sandwich Filter
It’s boring to add a simple layer of mask to an image.
In Makaron, you can add a layer of moving mask between figures and background.
That sounds interesting! #GIF

Moving Stickers
We provide lots of static stickers and moving stickers in ‘+’ button! Try it to let your artistic mind burst! #GIF
BTW: All the figures, cats or puppy can be saved as a sticker material with one click for future applications.

Preset
Would you like to get all the dynamic cool effects mentioned above?
Just find ‘Preset’ button, we have preset more than 10 sets of cool effects.
You will love it.


Hope you will like it.
To be Continued
Makaron Team

Hey guys!

We bring the special Christmas version as a special Christmas gift for all of you.

1. Just find “Xmas Preset” button, upload your favorite photo, change a special Xmas preset, funny Christmas hat, and we provide several pleasant songs at your choice. #GIF

2. “Long Press” is one of the most magical features of Makaron, now it’s also available for video browsing in ‘Discovery’, the magic is always keeping upgrading.

Merry Christmas！

[Unique Blending]
Have you experienced the following issues while using Makaron?
After separating and changing background you find the image background and subject colors donot match?
The image separatoin tool is missing details?
Light and shade of different people or image subjects do not match the background?
The good news is these problems are already fixable!
Upload the images, use the "Blend" tool to instantly match your image's subject and background.
You can also finetune, adjust image separation outlines, edit tone and exposure as you like to create the perfect image.
Recreate your fantasy into a reality.

To be continued
Makaron Team

Optimized the beauty effect, my friends like it very much, have a try~

Here is what's new:
- You can add text now!
- The UI is completely different，hope you like it~
- You have more chance to remove watermarking now！
- Stickers in your account won't be losed anymore!

What's new:
- You can add text now!
- Now Makaron can recognize animation characters. Come on, Iron Man and Naruto! Welcome to my world!

What's new:
- You can add text now!
- Now Makaron can recognize animation characters. Come on, Iron Man and Naruto! Welcome to my world!

Hi, Makaron comes again~
We've optimized sharpness of the picture. Now you can take the picture to be your wallpaper now.
Now our developer is updating the app day and night, hopes that you could enjoy it.
Descriptions below are the content of former big versions:
--------------------------------------------------
What's new:
- You can add text now!
- Now Makaron can recognize animation characters. Come on, Iron Man and Naruto! Welcome to my world!

Hi, Makaron's newest version is coming~

"Makaron-Sky Magic"

1. Added "sky" recognition function.
Do you always feel too boring with taking photos of the empty sky? Now, you can change your "custom sky" with our Makaron app!

2. Optimized the speed of manual cutout function.
How quick you are, how quick we are~

3.Optimized the effect of brightness.

Hi guys, here is the new version of Makaron, now you can change the sky magically!

1. "Sky" recognition function available
Do you always feel bored with taking photos of empty sky? Now, you can change your "customed sky" with Makaron!
(Only available in iOS12 or higher iOS versions)

2. Optimized the speed of manual cutout function.
How quick you are, how quick we are!

3.Optimized the effect of brightness.

Hopes you can enjoy it!
Makaron Team

Added "stroke" function that supporting figures, cats, and dogs.
Make your creative scrapbooks with Makaron! Our AI technology makes cutting and pasting become no longer difficult. Come and enjoy the fantastic "stroke" function!

----Here are the updates of Makaron 3.6----

Hi, the latest version is coming~

"Makaron-Sky Magic"

1. Added "sky" recognition function.
Do you always feel too boring with taking photos of the empty sky? Now, you can change your "custom sky" with our Makaron app!（iOS12 and higher version are available for sky changing）

2. Optimized the speed of manual cutout function.
How quick you are, how quick we are~

3.Optimized the effect of brightness.

Hi, the latest version is coming~

"Makaron-Sky Magic"

1. Added "sky" recognition function.
Do you always feel too boring with taking photos of the empty sky? Now, you can change your "custom sky" with our Makaron app!（iOS12 and higher version are available for sky changing）

2. Optimized the speed of manual cutout function.
How quick you are, how quick we are~

3.Optimized the effect of brightness.

Finally, Makaron can edit video now.
Yes, video. Finally.
It seems like the dream is coming just a little bit closer.

A person only takes up less than 5% of a video.
Without green screen, we use AI to segment and filter out a person frame by frame.
The edges are crystal clear.
can you believe we did it?

How long that will take?
Can you believe we did it in real-time?
Yes it takes a professional studio hours to do so, but we did it in real-time.

How exactly?
Magic-like AI
Working like hell day and night
And maybe
A little bit of laughable persistence

Why is that laughable?
Sometime a dream is laughable because no one believe in it.
But we do believe so.
We do believe that one dream: A simple product that will empower the creativity for all.

But now
We want more people to believe in this dream,
To believe in the creativity of every ordinary person

Makaron was born for this dream.
It is designed to be revolutionary.
Let ordinary people show off their work and improve creativity
Let Adobe stand by because their tools limits people from creation

At Makaron, we make content creation more free.
Because everyone’s idea is allowed to become true.

Try it
Makaron Team

Just one click, and you'll get your own passport photo, portrait, poster, Vlog home page, emoticons, and much more. It's that simple!

1. Create passport photos for free
Do you still go to photo studios for passport photos? Save yourself the trouble because Makaron can create a beautiful passport photo in just a second. Plus, you can choose from different background colors: red, white or blue. This saves you money, time, and hassles. What's more, if you are not happy with the result, just change it anytime!

2. Instantly create festive posters
Still paying others to create your festive posters? Use our templates to make your own posters. Everyone in your family can play a leading role, and you can send your good wishes to family and friends anytime. Say goodbye to Photoshop.

3. Change your WeChat portrait at any time
Want to develop your own portrait like one of those internet celebrities, but don't know where to start? No worries, Makaron can easily do that for you. You won’t be jealous of these Internet stars anymore!

4. Produce mega movies with special effects for free
Still using greenscreen + AE to create special effects? Running out of creative ideas? No worries, you can use Makaron to create special effects on your mobile phone and view the results in real-time. Plus, there are sample templates showing you how to play around with different effects – a must for those into making short videos!

All of these features are free for a limited time only. There are also other pleasant surprises in the app, designed specifically to bring joy to your life.
Enjoy!

To be Continued
Makaron Mobile Phone Team

Just one click, and you'll get your own passport photo, portrait, poster, Vlog home page, emoticons, and much more. It's that simple!

1. Create passport photos for free
Do you still go to photo studios for passport photos? Save yourself the trouble because Makaron can create a beautiful passport photo in just a second. Plus, you can choose from different background colors: red, white or blue. This saves you money, time, and hassles. What's more, if you are not happy with the result, just change it anytime!

2. Instantly create festive posters
Still paying others to create your festive posters? Use our templates to make your own posters. Everyone in your family can play a leading role, and you can send your good wishes to family and friends anytime. Say goodbye to Photoshop.

3. Change your WeChat portrait at any time
Want to develop your own portrait like one of those internet celebrities, but don't know where to start? No worries, Makaron can easily do that for you. You won’t be jealous of these Internet stars anymore!

4. Produce mega movies with special effects for free
Still using greenscreen + AE to create special effects? Running out of creative ideas? No worries, you can use Makaron to create special effects on your mobile phone and view the results in real-time. Plus, there are sample templates showing you how to play around with different effects – a must for those into making short videos!

All of these features are free for a limited time only. There are also other pleasant surprises in the app, designed specifically to bring joy to your life.
Enjoy!

To be Continued
Makaron Mobile Phone Team

Makaron features update

This time we bring more fun and cool features than before!

1. Member Only-Layer Order
Now you can break the limitation of the layer order.

2. Member Only-Draft Box
All layer information can be recorded with unlimited capacity. Non-members can also try it for free.

3. Member Only-Layer Blending
We provide layer blending presuits, cyberpunk, city glance, color combinations ...

4. Camera Template
Change the background in real time and shoot the perfect photo.

5. Layer locker
Any layers can be locked so it won’t be touched on the art board.

6. Watermark Removal
The video watermark removal is coming! Unlimited use for members, non-members can also use it by sharing app.


Enjoy ~
